data.name: Loathful
data.detailed_description:
Loathful is a Survival Horror game in first person that makes you dive into an old-school and retro-style universe with PS1 graphics. If you’d think you need photo-realistics graphics to face your fears, do not fool yourself.

You play as a young man working at "Residence": a company that is testing a new technology which allows anyone to upload their mind into the cloud temporarily, or for eternity.

Playing with subtle mechanics and puzzles, your very objective is to explore a foreign world that will constantly push you to your limits.

Inspired by very popular and appreciated games of the same genre, Loathful stands out for his old school design and a simple but effective gameplay.

Main characteristics:


Explore

Relive the emotions you had in your first Survival Horror thanks to the aesthetics in the same time you dive into a refreshing scenario.

Uncover the unknown

It’s your role to understand what’s going beneath the surface of this universe. The immersive world combined with the dark atmosphere will constantly pull you deeper and deeper inside the darkest shadows while you’re trying to find a way out of this nightmare.


Pure darkness

Loathful is a dark game. With only strict weapons, you will struggle with monsters and wraith to escape weird and mysterious situations. You are the weak person here. And everything that lives wants you to be dead.
-

data.short_description: Loathful is a Survival Horror in first person with PS1 graphics. Bring yourself in a retro-style adventure where all your nightmares are brought to life. Survive your demons, dive into your darkest fears to overthrow a mysterious virus who seems to have put his hands on this universe.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260 / ATI Radeon HD 4870
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1.5GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 660 / ATI Radeon HD 7850

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains non-realistic depictions of violence, some hinted at suggestive themes, and frequent scary imagery.
